Secondary - To evaluate toxicity induction chemotherapy comprise irinotecan hydrochloride cisplatin patient . - To assess whether induction chemotherapy regimen improve patient survival compare outcomes predecessor study , SWOG-9019 . OUTLINE : Patients receive dose-dense induction chemotherapy comprise irinotecan hydrochloride IV cisplatin IV day 1 8 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 2 course . After completion induction chemotherapy , patient undergo radiotherapy five day week approximately 7 week . Patients receive concurrent chemotherapy comprise cisplatin IV day 1 , 8 , 29 , 36 etoposide IV day 1-5 29-33 . After completion study therapy , patient follow 6 week .
